data.text: @snaprifice Yes that happened to me following covid in 2020. 18 months on smell changed to chemical/nasty perfume smell
@snaprifice Oh geez, that would be my worst nightmare
@snaprifice @loonylaura Mine was more like burning plastic - went on for about 4 months, sorry.

@snaprifice @JessHealyWalton I wonder if this might be due to an overgrowth of Hemophilus bugs in the nose. I sometimes experienced this after a heavy cold & remember the smell of the bugs cultured in my lab… so that’s why I associate the two.
Its nasty, and I have found that ocean swims have sorted it.
@snaprifice @destroyed4com4t I kept smelling it randomly throughout the day. That stopped, but now I smell a gross smell with hand soap.
@dsmvwlng I think it’s some kind of neurological damage similar to hallucinations from a gas leak
